formant_count.description: Number of formants (0–100, pad 3): 0 = none, 100 = extremely complex. Zero-padded.

f1_freq.description: First formant frequency in Hz (0–20000, pad 5). Zero-padded.

bandwidth.description: Average formant bandwidth in Hz (0–5000, pad 4). Zero-padded.

description: FOR (prefix), formant_count (3 digits), f1_freq (5 digits), bandwidth (4 digits); zero-padded, no subvar prefixes. Example: FOR007018900560 = formant_count 007, f1_freq 01890, bandwidth 0560.
